microphone_line_1_1761317290.original_text: Always be happy and trust yourself. Great things take time.

audio_file_line_1_1761453764.original_text: When you believe in God, then you can understand that everything happens for a reason.
audio_file_line_1_1761453764.translated_text: Quando credi in Dio, allora puoi capire che tutto accade per una ragione.

audio_file_line_1_1761454752.original_text: If you are struggling, that means you coming out of your comfort zone a step closer to your success.
audio_file_line_1_1761454752.translated_text: Se stai lottando, significa che usci dalla tua zona di comfort un passo più vicino al tuo successo.

auto_line_1_1761458679.original_text: Believe in quality rather than quantity.

auto_line_1_1761565704.original_text: Who God give me strength to fulfill my wishes.
